name: DesolationPoint
description:
Desolation Point is a game where friends can come together and unite against the undead. The goal is simple stay alive for as long as possible.

The game was made as a final project at Menntaskólinn á Ásbrú

Credits:

Aron Birgir Tryggvason - Programming & Game Development

Stefán Ingi Víðisson - Intro Video & Story writing

Styrmir Þór Wíum Sveinnson - Art & Game Design

Þórður Andri Kristjánsson - 3D Modeling & Sound

Kári Snær Kárason - Voice Acting

Ingibjörg Lilja Guðmundsdóttir - Map Creation
